'''Combat Override''' is [[Aloy]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Trivia==
* [[w:c:horizon:Combat Override|Combat Override]] is also the name of one of Aloy's learnable skills in ''Horizon Zero Dawn'', and perhaps generally refers to the [[w:c:horizon:Override|override]] mechanic, which she uses to control machines.
